'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The Radiant Court is the heart of commerce in the Free City, with merchants plying their wares all over the piers.

## Points of interest

* This is a fairly large area divided into roughly two halves by the canal. [Birna](/birna/) has a food stand next to the troupe stage with [Calandra](/calandra/) standing among her actors with ship hats. 
* The south-western corners has [Rosanella](/rosanella/) and [Yngfrith](/yngfrith/) patronizing the bar. Moving over to the eastern end, you find [Dessiral](/dessiral/) haunting the pier.
* Beyond stands [Ramaso](/ramaso/) and his emporium, with [Co'el Marcellus](/coelMarcellus/) overlooking the area.

## Characters

* [Calandra](/calandra/), head of the Pegleg Performers
* [Dessiral](/dessiral/), looking over the berth, hands out bounties.
* [Co'el Marcellus](/coelMarcellus/), a con artist and trainer.
* [First Mate Fallon](/firstMateFallon/), a street poet
* [Yngfrith](/yngfrith/), the owner of Modwyr

###### After [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/):

* [Barquami](/barquami/), a blind, blue aumaua
* [Taerna](/taerna/), pale elf wizard.

###### Merchants

* [Birna](/birna/), food
* [Rosanella](/rosanella/), bartender
* [Ramaso](/ramaso/), weapons, armor, gear
* [Dimesa](/dimesa/), in [The Treasure Trove](/theTreasureTrove/). Sells weapons, armor, accessories.

## Loot

* [Hemp](/hemp/) - "Stray Dog": In the south-eastern corner.
* [Epsilon](/epsilon/) - "Stray Cat": In the south-western corner.
* [Pale Hide](/paleHide/), [Eager Blade](/eagerBlade/), [Amra](/amra/): Sold by [Ramaso](/ramaso/)
